name: Visio Macro-Enabled Stencil File
summary: Learn about .VSSM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Since stencils contain custom shapes, sometimes it also makes sense to include macros that help to format and place the shapes within a diagram. Therefore, organizations may provide VSSM files instead of VSSX files when distributing their business stencils.

description: File used by Visio, a program used for making business diagrams; stores a collection of shapes that can be used for constructing diagrams; serves the same purpose as a .VSSX file, except it enables macros as part of the package.
